channel.title: [PI] Godwars
channel.description:
Right basically I'm creating a completely new godwars as my 317 PI base does not have one. Things I need help with
[ul][li]Needing 20 kills to use the portal (to teleport to your chosen boss)[/li] [li]Creating the portal with multiple choice[/li][/ul]
Yes I am a complete noob at this and would appreciate any help I can get, thanks community!

item.title: [PI] Godwars
item.dc:creator: @ProximityPlus ProximityPlus
item.description:
@ProximityPlus wrote:

[quote=“strd3stroyer, post:2, topic:420015”]I can help you…
It’s very easy…

Give me Monster ID’s you want to give EACH killcount
ETC: armadyl - avainsies

Then give me the portal ids…

Either that, or tv me[/quote]

I want it so when you kill a Hobgoblins (122) your killcount goes up by one. And eventually when you kill 20 hobgoblins you can use the portal. Also the portal hasnt been made yet

Read full topic
